translations: n．微环境：指生态系统中局部区域的环境条件，这些条件可能与周围的大环境有所不同，对生物体产生特定的影响。
· Microenvironments play a crucial role in the survival and growth of organisms.
微环境在生物体的生存和生长中起着至关重要的作用。

sentences.sentence: It will be interesting to see whether microenvironments other than skin have a similar effect.
sentences.translation: 搞清楚除了皮肤外的微环境是否也有同样的效益将是非常有趣的事情。

sentences.sentence: The arrayed topographic substrates provide an efficient tool for engineering the microenvironments for sensor neuronal cells.
sentences.translation: 阵列型拓扑结构基底为构建传感器细胞微环境提供了有效的工程化手段。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To investigate the influence of the local tumor microenvironments on the linearly patterned programmed cell necrosis (LPPCN).
sentences.translation: 目的：观察肿瘤局部微环境对肿瘤细胞发生线形程序性坏死(LPPCN)的影响。
